title: Πούσι
description: TO ΠOYΣI EINAI H ΔEYTEPH ΠOIHTIKH ΣYΛΛOΓH TOY NIKOY KABBAΔIA KAI EKΔOΘHKE ΓIA ΠPΩTH ΦOPA TO 1947 AΠO TON A. KAPABIA. EKTOTE EKΔOΘHKE 4 ΦOPEΣ ΣTIΣ EKΔ. ΓAΛAΞIAΣ (1961-1971), 16 ΦOPEΣ ΣTIΣ EKΔ. KEΔPOΣ (1975-1989) KAI, AΠO TON OKTΩBPIO 1989 MEXPI TON ΔEKEMBPIO 2000, 13 ΦOPEΣ ΣTIΣ EKΔ. AΓPA.ΠEPIEXEI TA 14 ΠAPAKATΩ ΠOIHMATA : ΠOYΣI, KURO SIWO, ΣTEPIANH ZAΛH, CAMBAY'S WATER, APMIΔA, BLACK AND WHITE, EΣMEPAΛΔA, KAPANTI, ΘAΛAΣΣIA ΠANIΣ, FEDERICO GARCIA LORCA, ΘEΣΣAΛONIKH, ΣTAYPOΣ TOY NOTOY, MAPEA, ΛYXNOΣ TOY AΛAΔΔINOY. ΠPOKEITAI ΓIA TETPAΣTIXA ΠOIHMATA ΣE ΣTAYPΩTH H ZEYΓAPΩTH OMOIOKATAΛHΞIA.H ΣYΛΛOΓH EINAI AΦIEPΩMENH ΣTHN EΛΓKA KABBAΔIA KAI KAΘE ΠOIHMA XΩPIΣTA KAI ΣE ENA ΔIAΦOPETIKO ΠPOΣΩΠO, ΣYΓΓPAΦEIΣ, HΘOΠOIOYΣ, ZΩΓPAΦOYΣ, ΔIKOYΣ KI ANΩNYMOYΣ.KOΣMEITAI ME ΠPOMETΩΠIΔA TOY ΓIANNH TΣAPOYXH.
author: Nikos Kavadias
